name: Jean
description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius in Mondstadt.

skillTalents.name: Favonius Bladework
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Thực hiện tối đa 5 lần đánh kiếm liên tiếp.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to launch an enemy using the power of wind.

Launched enemies will slowly fall to the ground.
Nhảy Dậm
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Gale Blade
skillTalents.description:
Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.
Nhấn Giữ
At the cost of continued Stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding enemies towards her front.

Direction can be adjusted.

Character is immobile during skill Thời Gian Kéo Dài.

upgrades.name: Thời Gian Kéo Dài Tối Đa

skillTalents.name: Dandelion Breeze
skillTalents.description:
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding enemies and causing Anemo DMG.

At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for nearby allied units and all party members. HP restored scale off Jean's ATK.
Dandelion Field

Continuously regenerates HP for one ally and imbues them with the Anemo attribute.
Deals Anemo DMG to enemies entering or exiting the field.

passiveTalents.name: Wind Companion
passiveTalents.description: Hits by Tấn công thườngs have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

passiveTalents.name: Let the Wind Lead
passiveTalents.description: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

passiveTalents.name: Guiding Breeze
passiveTalents.description: Nấu hoàn mỹ món ăn thuộc loại hồi phục, có tỷ lệ 12% x2 sản lượng.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all enemies have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.
